name: Octopus Fighter タコファイター
name_original: Octopus Fighter タコファイター
description:
In Octopus Fighter,  with octopus, do fencing versus your friends  or AI !

To play you just have two buttons :

  player 1                                                                     player 2

S - attack                              or                            Left - attack

D - Dash                                or                           Right - Dash

Tips :

You can still dash to avoid when you are hit, this allow you to take it the win if you attack just after.

Credit :

Code and Art are made by me (Darkyann).

Music - Chloe

(music made for inspiration and exemple)

 https://chloesnow.itch.io/

https://www.patreon.com/ChloeSnow

Game designer - Nox

Art director - Alexis
